abstract: Spokane, Wash, Mayor David A Condon calls for Rachel A Dolezal, white former NAACP official at center of controversy over misrepresenting herself as black woman, to step down as chairwoman of city's Police Ombudsman commission; Dolezal is accused of openly discussing confidential information and of violating other organization rules and procedures.
lead_paragraph: The mayor of Spokane called for Rachel A. Dolezal to resign from a voluntary city body for breaching confidentiality rules, among other violations.

headline.main: Rachel Dolezal Told to Quit 2nd Post
headline.print_headline: Ex-N.A.A.C.P. Leader Told to Quit 2nd Post

snippet: The mayor of Spokane called for Rachel A. Dolezal to resign from a voluntary city body for breaching confidentiality rules, among other violations.

keywords.value: National Assn for the Advancement of Colored People
keywords.name: organizations
